channel.title: Learning the basics
channel.description:
First, download a client and source at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html When done exract them with winrar. You may download winrar at http://www.rarlab.com/ First lets start off by getting you on the server.
how to run your server: open up your source folder and double click run. then go to your clientand double click run. after it is open log into the server with any name and pass. *your server is now up*
how to make yourself mod-owner: now log out open up your source and go to your file "characters" open the folder then you will see a notepad with your user open it. *look for character rights = 0* change the value from 0 too 3. 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner / co owner some have a 4th 4 = hidden admin
Adding npc's: go to your source find a folder called npc located in the config folder. look for the npc you wish to add. Then it has a code next to it such as it will say hang = 0 now go to. Autospawn and type "spawn = 0 3219 3219 0 0 0 0 0 1. 3219 are the coords you are placing your npc at. just remember to tab the 0's over. then compile the server and log on. should be there

First, download a client and source at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html When done exract them with winrar. You may download winrar at http://www.rarlab.com/ First lets start off by getting you on the server.

how to run your server: open up your source folder and double click run. then go to your clientand double click run.
after it is open log into the server with any name and pass. your server is now up

how to make yourself mod-owner: now log out open up your source and go to your file “characters” open the folder then you will see a notepad with your user open it. look for character rights = 0 change the value from 0 too 3. 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner / co owner some have a 4th 4 = hidden admin

Adding npc’s: go to your source find a folder called npc located in the config folder. look for the npc you wish to add. Then it has a code next to it such as it will say hang = 0 now go to. Autospawn and type "spawn = 0 3219 3219 0 0 0 0 0 1. 3219 are the coords you are placing your npc at. just remember to tab the 0’s over. then compile the server and log on. should be there
